With a pretty face, timid character and such reliance and dependence on his puppet friend Ukon, no one would expect that he is the one his policewoman aunt Kaoruko would turn to when she faces perfect crimes. With Ukon on his hand, Sakon instantly changes from a timid boy into a careful, quiet, observant, calculating detective. Quite a contrast to Ukon, who is a chatterbox that is much more into popstars and talking to girls. This uncanny pair can see through the criminal`s plots as well as the victim's mind. As Sakon's grandfather once said: \"Controlling a puppet is reading the heart. b62971df-0e2b-4d37-bc82-821efa10e2e1:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b62971df-0e2b-4d37-bc82-821efa10e2e1","title":{"en":"Princess in the Rough"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"쓰레기장 속 황녀님"},{"ko-ro":"Sseuregijang Song Hwangnyeonim"},{"en":"The Princess in the Dumpster"},{"es":"La princesa imperial que salió del basurero"},{"uk":"Принцеса у смітнику"},{"ru":"Забытая принцесса"},{"th":"ฉันคือองค์หญิงในกองขยะ"},{"ja":"ゴミ捨て場の皇女様"},{"zh":"垃圾堆里的皇女"},{"zh-hk":"廢墟中的皇女"},{"id":"Putri yang Telantar"},{"fr":"La Princesse oubliée"}],"lastChapter":"98","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la","tr","en","id"],"description":{"en":"Deep sunken cheeks, dirty skin which lost its original color, twig-like wrists, filthy fingernails and a much smaller body for her age. And with neglected hair hanging over half of her face, this small child is actually the forgotten Royal Princess of the Empire. Unable to stifle her hunger any longer, she crawls out of her hiding within a tiny, old, worn-down castle in search of food…\n\n\"I'm hungry,\" the small girl who's wearing nothing but shabby clothes murmured without even realizing, \"Can I eat this…?\"\n\nHer small fern-like hand tore a piece of vegetation off of the ground, but she eventually put it down while shaking her head from side to side. The little girl hadn't had a proper meal for three days…\n\n\"Estrella…\" the child recited the name, her words one with the wind. It was a precious name that she had earned only after a long time.\n\n\"I'm sorry I'm late.\"\n\n\"…It's alright,\" the little one who replied then slumped onto Elias' chest.\n\n---\nA girl with glowing, bejeweled eyes and a tiny dragon has been found in an abandoned palace...and there is no doubt she is the long-forgotten daughter of the Emperor. Growing up wild and free, she is unaware of how special she is, especially since her eyes see things others cannot. As the Emperor and his three other children take her in and try to get closer to her, will she learn to trust them? And will this new addition to their family bring fortune or ruin to the empire?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:**\n* Chapters: [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54097129), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H041045698)\n* Volumes: [MrBlue](https://mrblue.com/novel/detail/E000081680?pid=E000081680), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6287397), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2259005289)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%93%B0%EB%A0%88%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%A5-%EC%86%8D-%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2397), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55166366)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/princess-in-the-rough/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30062)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%BB%A2%E5%A2%9F%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E7%9A%87%E5%A5%B3/139)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Putri-yang-Telantar/168)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/61877)\n* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/507646/)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B0/120)","fr":"Des joues enfoncées profondes, une peau sale qui a perdu sa couleur d’origine, des poignets en forme de brindille, des ongles sales et un corps beaucoup plus petit pour son âge. b631915b-2aba-4fc4-ab23-4497d74f0f85:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b631915b-2aba-4fc4-ab23-4497d74f0f85","title":{"en":"Thousands of Dreamless Years"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"梦未几已千年"},{"zh-ro":"Meng Wei Ji Yi Qiannian"},{"ja":"夢はもう千年も経った"}],"lastChapter":"137","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Lan Xieyi, an ordinary boy, wakes up one day to find he's travelled through dimensions and has become a demon's male pet! And he's even being used by the owner of this body to act as Bai Yueguang's substitute - this demon slave's body is actually quite sweet! Gan's father, a hotdog supercop with the moniker of \"Dan Goda,\" is fed up with this situation to the point where he decides to send Gan to his old educational institution: a fighting school called Roujuu Private High School. There, Gan learns to harness his raw abilities into \"Gunfighting,\" the family martial arts style resembling firearms. Think .44 Magnum punches, Shotgun Fists, Sniper Stances, and you've got the essence of Gun-Fu down.   \n  \nAt his new school Gan also falls madly in love hot chick, Yuki and runs afoul of 17-year old transfer student and sure-to-be-rival Garrick Rider, prodigal master of the Hanged Cross technique. Fights over Yuki's affections take place in the school stadium, but it turns that she has little need for defenders of her honor. Yuki is, like an overwhelming majority of students at Roujuu, a fantastic fighter. And from here on out, everbody is not only \"kung-fu fighting,\" but also busy filling pages with over-the-top battle scenes."},"links":{"al":"56048","ap":"go-da-gun","kt":"19444","mal":"26048","mu":"5736"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

She is his second cousin, and they met with each other when they were children although he doesn’t remember her much. She is in the second year of a high school attached to Aoba Junior Collage.  \n  \nThere are five people living in Narutaki-So. First, Chanohata Kotomi is living in the room #1. She is a best friend of Kozue. Then, the resident of the room #3 is Momono Megumi. She is a kind of person who goes her own way. In the room #5, Kurosaki Sayoko and her daughter Asami are living. Asami is in the first year of a junior high. Finally, in the room #6, Haibara Yukio is living with his puppet, “Johnny”.  \n  \nThey are all characteristic and eccentric persons. Während Rieta sich in Lebensgefahr befindet, taucht plötzlich der berüchtigte Großherzog von Axias auf. Just before Rietta is buried, Archduke Axias, rumored to be a cruel tyrant, arrives at the funeral to collect the enormous debt Count Casarius still owes him.\n\n\"Everyone here seems to feel sorry for her, and I still have a debt to collect from Casarius… If I take her instead, I think all of you here should be happy,\" he smiled, \"Hello, my temptress.\"\n\n---\nAs plague and turmoil afflicts the empire, enchanting widow Rieta Tristi finds herself at the mercy of a malicious nobleman and his dying wish to have her buried alive beside his corpse. The plague has taken her husband, slave traders have taken her young child, and now her own life is at risk -- until an unexpected visit from the empire's outcast prince changes everything.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535\u0026weekday=wed)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2405)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/feihuangzideshenmiqingren/list?title_no=1566)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/likeawind/list?title_no=2272)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2572)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2585)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2298)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001066)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2682)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2330)","es":"En un imperio azotado por la plaga y turbado por intrigas políticas, Rieta Tristi lo ha perdido todo: la peste se llevó a su marido y los comerciantes de esclavos se llevaron a su hija. Now, unable to afford college, Shota works a part-time job, in addition to his full-time job at his uncle's factory. He dreams of one day saving enough money to go to college. He lives alone, on the second floor of one of his uncle's warehouses, and doesn't have any friends. Everywhere he goes, he rides a bicycle, with headphones to block out the flashback-inducing sounds of the cars. His quiet way of life is about to be interrupted. Due to pressures from the economy, Shota's job at his uncle's factory is going to be cut to half-time/half-pay for a while. In addition, Shota's uncle has agreed to lend the first floor of Shota's warehouse to a college club. This club is building a solar car to enter in a race, and they're hoping to get Shota to lend them his mechanical expertise. He's lived with uncaring foster parents for most of his life, alienated from the other kids at his school, owner of a cynical, unhappy mentality. Komatsuzaki is a violent, unpredictable bully whose head trauma causes him to act in mysterious, inexplicable ways. Arakawa is a no-nonsense, normal girl who pines after Komatsuzaki but can never have him.  \nA teacher with just one working eye. A mother who committed suicide. A daughter in an endless coma. Attempted rapes, murders, extortion, sexual deviance, and a freakish explosion in the butterfly population. All of these elements are whirled together in a story spanning 10 years, a tale of blackness, pain, and apocalypse. And maybe just a bit of hope and redemption. It's a spiritual cross between the misanthropic suburban malevolence of Kyoko Okazaki's Rivers Edge and the eerie mysticality of Donnie Darko.","es":"Suzuki es un chico problemático. Arakawa é uma garota dentro dos padrões, normal, que tem um desejo por Komatsuzaki mas nunca poderá tê-lo. Uma professora com apenas um olho bom. Uma mãe que cometeu suicídio. Uma filha num coma sem fim. Tentativas de estupros, extorsões, apelações sexuais e uma esquisita explosão na população de borboletas. b8021364-a92c-4d5f-83f7-801b2cd6904b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b8021364-a92c-4d5f-83f7-801b2cd6904b","title":{"en":"The Temple of El Alamein"},"altTitles":[{"es":"El templo de Alamein"},{"ja-ro":"El Alamein no Shinden"},{"ja":"エル・アラメインの神殿"}],"lastChapter":"8","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","es"],"description":{"en":"The Temple of El Alamein is a compilation of World War II short stories from the perspective of the German military personnel. As the saying goes, the winner writes history, and these stories are the untold, unwritten part of the history of WWII. Taking place between 1940 and 1945, when the war was at its most violent peak, each story takes place in a different part of the world where Germans were fighting.  \r\n  \r\nOne story takes place in Egypt where soldiers find an ancient ruin that prove the existence of dinosaurs that helped build the Great Pyramids. Another story tells how one German fighter jet was able to take down a B-47 Stratojet 40,000 ft. in the air, far above what a fighter jet could achieve at the time.","es":"El Templo de El Alamein es una compilación de historias cortas de la Segunda Guerra Mundial desde la perspectiva del personal militar alemán. Como dice el dicho, el ganador escribe la historia, y estas historias son la parte no contada y no escrita de la historia de la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ocurre entre 1940 y 1945, cuando la guerra estaba en su punto más violento, cada historia tiene lugar en una parte diferente del mundo donde los alemanes estaban luchando.  \r\n  \r\nUna historia tiene lugar en Egipto donde los soldados encuentran una antigua ruina que prueba la existencia de los dinosaurios que ayudaron a construir las Grandes Pirámides. Otra historia cuenta cómo un avión de combate alemán fue capaz de derribar un B-47 Stratojet a 40.000 pies de altura, muy por encima de lo que un avión de combate podía lograr en ese momento."},"links":{"al":"50959","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B01MZ01UHL/","ap":"el-alamein-no-shinden","bw":"de6ece32e4-4d93-4289-9181-5c59eea9b6f7","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/390771/A001704813/","kt":"10229","mal":"20959","mu":"30113"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
